dcterms:description: The DIVA dataset is a new spatio-temporal action detection dataset for untrimmed videos, adapted from the VIRAT dataset with new annotations for 12 actions focusing on the public security domain. It consists of 455 video clips totaling 12 hours and 40 minutes, with actions including vehicle U-turn, vehicle left-turn, vehicle right turn, closing trunk, opening trunk, loading, unloading, transport heavy carry, open (door), close (door), enter, and exit.
dcterms:title: DIVA

dcterms:description: THUMOS’14 is a dataset for action recognition with a large number of classes, containing 200 annotated validation videos and 213 annotated test videos for 20 action classes.
dcterms:title: THUMOS’14

dcterms:description: AVA is a video dataset of spatio-temporally localized atomic visual actions, designed to facilitate the study of action recognition in videos.
dcterms:title: AVA

dcterms:description: VIRAT is a large-scale benchmark dataset for event recognition in surveillance video, providing a comprehensive resource for action recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: VIRAT
